markup.content:
mixin paginationItem(count, isCurrent)
	if isCurrent
		li.c-pagination__item.c-pagination__item--current
			a.c-pagination__link.c-pagination__link--current(href='#') #{count}
	else
		li.c-pagination__item
			a.c-pagination__link(href='#') #{count}

mixin paginationSkippAll(directionClass)
	li.c-pagination__item.c-pagination__item--skipall
			a.c-pagination__link(href='#')
				svg.c-pagination__arrow.c-pagination__arrow--skipall(class=directionClass width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24')
					use(xlink:href='#c-paginationarrow__skippall')
					
mixin paginationBesides(directionClass)
	li.c-pagination__item.c-pagination__item--besides
			a.c-pagination__link(href='#')
				svg.c-pagination__arrow(class=directionClass width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24')
					use(xlink:href='#c-paginationarrow__arrow')

mixin pagination(maxitems, currentPosition)
	-
		var n = 1
		maxitems = maxitems + 1

	svg(style='display: none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24')
		title c-paginationarrow
		path#c-paginationarrow__skippall(d='M6 6h2.016v12H6V6zm12.422 10.594L17.016 18l-6-6 6-6 1.406 1.406L13.828 12z')
		path#c-paginationarrow__arrow(d='M15.422 16.078l-1.406 1.406-6-6 6-6 1.406 1.406-4.594 4.594z')

	ul.c-pagination(role='menubar' aria-label='Pagination')
		+paginationSkippAll
		+paginationBesides
		while n < maxitems
			if n === currentPosition
				+paginationItem(n, true)
			else
				+paginationItem(n)
			- n++
		+paginationBesides('c-pagination__arrow--right')
		+paginationSkippAll('c-pagination__arrow--right')

+pagination(10, 2)
